action_item: Users & Roles - Ensure that Neal, Chris, Surya, and Ramesh verify their NextGen access today.
notes: Follow up with the team to confirm access to NextGen.

action_item: Reports - Forward the document received from Surya regarding NextGen access to the team.
Reports - Upload the claim form into the chat for the team.
notes: Ensure that the claim form is accessible to all participants.

action_item: Reports - Provide examples of claims for each payer to the team.
notes: Examples should include main insurance companies and be moved to the SharePoint folder later today.

action_item: Requirements - Consolidate billing rules and service codes into the requirements sheet.
notes: Ensure clarity on what services get billed to which payers.

action_item: Requirements - Clarify the service code modifications based on payer requirements.
notes: Different payers may have unique requirements for service codes.

action_item: Requirements - Define and document the billing rules for service codes in the spreadsheet.
notes: Include descriptions, service codes, charges, units, and any modifiers needed.

action_item: Reports - Confirm if there are any existing rules for CPT codes and their billing intervals.
notes: Determine if there are defaults for billing based on time or session.

action_item: Requirements - Set up rules for bundled billing based on service parameters.
notes: Ensure that the system can handle bundled billing scenarios.
